entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Wet snow changing to snow this evening. Fog patches dissipating late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast early this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 16 March 2023
